![](images/wave_of_inspiration.png){style="width:100px"}

Websites realted to my hobbies. These are primarily related to role playing games. [My itch.io page](https://m-gemmell.itch.io/)
![](images/PUML_itch_civer.png){style="width:200px; border-radius:15px"}

PUML is a homebrewed variant of the [FIST RPG](https://claymorerpgs.itch.io/fist). Whereas FIST is a high lethality system, PUML attempts to be less lethal allowing characters to more easily survive through a campaign. Link: [https://m-gemmell.itch.io/puml](https://m-gemmell.itch.io/puml) ## Primeval Deities
![](images/primeval_deities.png){style="width:150px"}

A website to host faction information of the Primeval deities for the [FIST RPG](https://claymorerpgs.itch.io/fist). Contains missions, lore, and a "bestiary". Link: [https://m-gemmell.github.io/Primeval_Deities_FIST/](https://m-gemmell.github.io/Primeval_Deities_FIST/) ## THE RUSTLANDS
![](images/RUSTLANDS_LOGO.png){style="width:150px"}

The Rustlands is a setting for FIST. It is heavily steeped in speculative biology with various sentient creatures roaming the lands. Due to the war of 2 deities the waters of this alternate Earth have drained into the ground. Storms rage across the whole world with only a few safe havens formed by the presence of 2 other deities. It is one of these safe havens where the team will enter and explore. Link: [https://m-gemmell.itch.io/the-rust-lands](https://m-gemmell.itch.io/the-rust-lands) ## POPS: Possible Oil Pipe Sabotage
![](images/M-POPS.png){style="width:150px"}

A Dilemma mission for the [FIST RPG](https://claymorerpgs.itch.io/fist), were the PCs mercenary crew must decide between protecting an oil pipeline or sabotaging it. Descend into the dense Black forest and lay down you mark on the world. Link: [https://m-gemmell.itch.io/pops-possible-oil-pipe-sabotage](https://m-gemmell.itch.io/pops-possible-oil-pipe-sabotage) ## AWE: Auroras & Worm Eradication Snow sport enthusiasts are being found dead with shark-like bites at the Aurora ski resort in Skifry, Canada. Refraction Sports are planning to hold a televised event next year at the Aurora. They want these deaths to stop. Discover the mystery in this [FIST RPG](https://claymorerpgs.itch.io/fist) mission. Link: [https://m-gemmell.itch.io/awe-auroras-and-worm-eradication](https://m-gemmell.itch.io/awe-auroras-and-worm-eradication) ## The Aurora's Avarice
![](images/aurora.png){style="width:100px"}

A Mystery for the RPG [Monster of the Week](https://evilhat.com/product/monster-of-the-week/). It includes a skiing mouintain town on the off season, a cult, and giant Ice worms. Link: [https://m-gemmell.github.io/RPGs/Monster_of_the_week/The_auroras_avarice/01-The_auroras_avarice.html](https://m-gemmell.github.io/RPGs/Monster_of_the_week/The_auroras_avarice/01-The_auroras_avarice.html)
